description.default: [Open Source] Status bar Pomodoro timer, automatic markdown export, multi-select on mobile, enhanced folding, annotation, bottom backlinks, sync blocks, mind map, block relationship graph, text to reference, quick capture with camera, reading points, bidirectional links, AI knowledge base Q&A, streaming AI, database backlinks, flashcard priority, document merge, periodic reminders, delete cards during review, flashcard image cloze, move to today's note, clean up invalid flashcards
description.zh_CN: 【已开源】状态栏番茄钟、自动导出markdown、移动端多选、增强折叠、批注、底部反链、同步块、思维导线、块关系图、文本转引用、拍照闪念、阅读点、双向互链、AI知识库问答、流式AI、数据库反链、闪卡优先级、文档合并、定期提醒、复习时删卡、闪卡图片挖空、移到今日笔记、清理失效闪卡
